name: BoneDust
description:
BoneDust is a complicated mystery-simulation-strategy game, where you try to figure out the way to turn bones into the best dust ever.

Will you be able to buy all 8 cursed skeletons? Or will you go bankrupt right away? What is the key? Find out today.

Made in 48 hours for InnoGameDev Halloween Jam.

Music by John Leonard French

Brick background by GlowFox Games
